name: Reflector
description: Reflector, reflects tokens from certain addresses to all other addresses. Reflects tokens from certain addresses to all other addresses.

functionDecorators.name: reflect
functionDecorators.description: Reflects all tokens from each address in the reflects list to everyone except the addresses in the noReflects list.

functionDecorators.name: reflects
functionDecorators.description: Gets all addresses whose funds get reflected.

returnDecorators.name: reflects_
returnDecorators.description: All addresses whose funds are reflected.
